name: zfegg/zfegg-admin-skeleton
description: ZFegg Admin 架构应用程序. 克隆 Apigility Skeleton Application.

suggest.zfcampus/zf-apigility-doctrine: zfcampus/zf-apigility-doctrine ~1.0 to create Doctrine-Connected REST services
